        Parameters:
        dataPath - Path of your data folder on the node
        network - Network name on Docker to link all XServer

    • Method Detail

      • createServer

        public void createServer(@NotNull
                         XServer server)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException,
                         IllegalStateException,
                         FileNotFoundException,
                         InterruptedException,
                         TimeoutException,
                         IOException
        Create a server from XServer to Docker
        Parameters:
        server - XServer object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - throw when server or server jar is null
        IllegalStateException - throw when server with the same name is already registered
        FileNotFoundException - throw when the server jar or a server files are not found
        InterruptedException - throw when docker crash
        TimeoutException - throw when docker is unreachable
        IOException - throw when docker return an error

                             XServer server)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             IllegalStateException,

                             TimeoutException,
                             IOException
        Start a server asynchronously and emit the ServerStartedEvent when the server is open
        Parameters:
        server - XServer object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - throw when server is null
        IllegalStateException - throw when the server is already started
        InterruptedException - throw when docker crash
        TimeoutException - throw when docker is unreachable
        IOException - throw when docker return an error

        Stop a server
        Parameters:
        server - XServer object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - throw when server is null
